task.title: Coffee Latte Frozen Yogurt Recipe
task.shortdesc: This recipe and its nutritional information can be found at http://www.cuisinart.com/recipes/desserts/113.html.

taskbody.prereq:
The ingredients are as follows:
1 cup of whole milk
1 packet of plain gelatin
½ a cup of granulated sugar
3 tablespoons of instant espresso powder
1 quart (or about 3 ½ cups) of low-fat vanilla yogurt
½ a cup of half-and-half

step.cmd: Sprinkle gelatin, and let it stand for 1 minute.
Heat the milk and gelatin, and stir until smooth.
Stir in sugar and espresso powder, and cook until sugar is dissolved.
Transfer to a medium bowl to cool.
Add the yogurt and half-and-half, and stir until completely blended.
Pour the mixture into the freezer bowl.
step.info: Be sure not to fill it higher than half an inch from the top.

step.cmd: If consistency is not to your desire, place the frozen yogurt into an airtight container, and freeze for at least 2 hours.
step.info: Remove from freezer 15 minutes before serving.
